segments.text: Observing this scene, the kitchen looks warm and lived-in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is drying a plate, completely zoned in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is a total flood zone right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling out, drenching the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's gross how it's just pooling there unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the boy is climbing for cookies on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thing looks like it's about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out, hand deep in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready, arm extended hopefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their sneaky cookie heist is almost endearing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden seems perfect and quiet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang seeing the hazards no one notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me of times when kids get into trouble unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor things, they don't know the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
